A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, left to fend for itself when its owners move away, has gone feral and taken to stalking townsfolk, who fear and love the cat because it kills rats and mice. When the parents of the boy vow to kill the cat, the boy and the cat concoct a plan of revenge.
